event.description: Ian Desmond grounds out, shortstop Jed Lowrie to first baseman Brett Wallace.
Danny Espinosa called out on strikes.
Rick Ankiel triples (1) on a fly ball to center fielder Jason Bourgeois.
Chad Tracy flies out to center fielder Jason Bourgeois.
Jason Michaels singles on a line drive to center fielder Jason Bourgeois.
With Mark Teahen batting, Jason Michaels caught stealing 2nd base, catcher Jason Castro to shortstop Jed Lowrie.
Mark Teahen called out on strikes.
Bryce Harper singles on a ground ball to right fielder Travis Buck.
Roger Bernadina pops out to shortstop Jed Lowrie.
Pitcher Change: Kyle Weiland replaces Livan Hernandez.
Jesus Flores doubles (1) on a fly ball to center fielder Jason Bourgeois.
Ian Desmond strikes out swinging, catcher Jason Castro to first baseman Brett Wallace.
Danny Espinosa grounds out to first baseman Brett Wallace. Jesus Flores to 3rd.
Rick Ankiel grounds out, second baseman Jose Altuve to first baseman Brett Wallace.
Defensive Substitution: Carlos Corporan replaces catcher Jason Castro, batting 9th, playing catcher.
Chad Tracy flies out to right fielder Travis Buck.
Jason Michaels pops out to second baseman Jose Altuve.
Mark Teahen flies out to left fielder J. B. Shuck.
Pitcher Change: Brett Myers replaces Kyle Weiland.
Bryce Harper grounds out, second baseman Jose Altuve to first baseman Brett Wallace.
Roger Bernadina doubles (1) on a fly ball to center fielder Jason Bourgeois.
Jesus Flores doubles (2) on a fly ball to right fielder Travis Buck. Roger Bernadina scores.
Ian Desmond flies out to left fielder J. B. Shuck.
Danny Espinosa called out on strikes.
Defensive Substitution: Brian Bixler replaces second baseman Jose Altuve, batting 2nd, playing second base.
Pitcher Change: Fernando Abad replaces Brett Myers.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch hitter Brett Carroll replaces Rick Ankiel.
Brett Carroll flies out to center fielder Jason Bourgeois.
Tyler Moore strikes out swinging.

Anthony Rendon flies out to center fielder Jason Bourgeois.
Defensive Substitution: Justin Ruggiano replaces left fielder J. B. Shuck, batting 1st, playing left field.
Defensive Substitution: Brad Snyder replaces right fielder Travis Buck, batting 3rd, playing right field.
Defensive Substitution: Joe Thurston replaces third baseman Chris Johnson, batting 5th, playing third base.
Pitcher Change: Brandon Lyon replaces Fernando Abad.
Carlos Rivero flies out to left fielder Justin Ruggiano.
Bryce Harper grounds out, second baseman Brian Bixler to first baseman Brett Wallace.
Roger Bernadina singles on a line drive to left fielder Justin Ruggiano.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch runner Corey Brown replaces Roger Bernadina.
Jhonatan Solano flies out to right fielder Brad Snyder.
Brandon Barnes remains in the game as the center fielder.
Defensive Substitution: Jonathan Singleton replaces first baseman Brett Wallace, batting 7th, playing first base.
Defensive Substitution: Diory Hernandez replaces center fielder Jason Bourgeois, batting 8th, playing shortstop.
Pitcher Change: Wesley Wright replaces Brandon Lyon.
Andres Blanco grounds out, second baseman Brian Bixler to first baseman Jonathan Singleton.
Steve Lombardozzi grounds out, second baseman Brian Bixler to first baseman Jonathan Singleton.
Brett Carroll singles on a ground ball to shortstop Diory Hernandez.
Tyler Moore grounds into a force out, shortstop Diory Hernandez to second baseman Brian Bixler. Brett Carroll out at 2nd.
George Springer remains in the game as the designated hitter.
Pitcher Change: Wilton Lopez replaces Wesley Wright.
Anthony Rendon grounds out, shortstop Diory Hernandez to first baseman Jonathan Singleton.
Carlos Rivero strikes out swinging.
Xavier Paul strikes out swinging.
J. B. Shuck walks.
Jose Altuve singles on a ground ball to left fielder Roger Bernadina. J. Shuck to 2nd.
Travis Buck grounds into double play, second baseman Danny Espinosa to shortstop Ian Desmond to first baseman Chad Tracy. J. Shuck to 3rd. Jose Altuve out at 2nd.
Jack Cust grounds out, second baseman Danny Espinosa to first baseman Chad Tracy.
Chris Johnson grounds out, shortstop Ian Desmond to first baseman Chad Tracy.
Jed Lowrie walks.
Brett Wallace grounds into double play, second baseman Danny Espinosa to shortstop Ian Desmond to first baseman Chad Tracy. Jed Lowrie out at 2nd.
Pitcher Change: Ross Detwiler replaces Edwin Jackson.
Jason Bourgeois grounds out, third baseman Mark Teahen to first baseman Chad Tracy.
Jason Castro flies out to center fielder Rick Ankiel.
J. B. Shuck singles on a ground ball to third baseman Mark Teahen.
Jose Altuve called out on strikes.
Defensive Substitution: Tyler Moore replaces first baseman Chad Tracy, batting 4th, playing first base.

Jack Cust walks.
Chris Johnson homers (1) on a fly ball to center field. Jack Cust scores.
Jed Lowrie pops out to first baseman Tyler Moore.
Brett Wallace strikes out swinging.

Defensive Substitution: Steve Lombardozzi replaces second baseman Danny Espinosa, batting 2nd, playing second base.
Defensive Substitution: Carlos Rivero replaces third baseman Mark Teahen, batting 6th, playing third base.

Jason Bourgeois singles on a line drive to center fielder Rick Ankiel.
Carlos Corporan grounds out, second baseman Steve Lombardozzi to first baseman Tyler Moore. Jason Bourgeois to 2nd.

Offensive Substitution: Pinch runner Brandon Barnes replaces Jed Lowrie.
Brett Wallace grounds out, third baseman Carlos Rivero to first baseman Tyler Moore.
Jason Bourgeois hit by pitch.
With Carlos Corporan batting, Jason Bourgeois steals (1) 2nd base.
Carlos Corporan reaches on fielding error by third baseman Carlos Rivero. Brandon Barnes scores. Jason Bourgeois to 3rd.
Justin Ruggiano grounds into double play, shortstop Andres Blanco to second baseman Steve Lombardozzi to first baseman Tyler Moore. Carlos Corporan out at 2nd.
